sentences.en: He is a very witty speaker.
He is a witty man, and an inspiration to all of us.
sentences.cn: 他机智风趣，鼓舞激励着我们所有人。

sentences.en: He is, by nature, a joker, a witty man with a sense of fun.
sentences.cn: 他天性是个爱开玩笑的人，说话诙谐，很有幽默感。

sentences.en: He made a very witty remark.
sentences.cn: 他说了一句十分机智的话.

sentences.en: He scored a bull's - eye in their argument with that witty retort.
sentences.cn: 在他们的辩论中他那一句机智的反驳击中了要害.

sentences.en: He was witty, amusing and gifted with a sharp business brain.
sentences.cn: 他机智诙谐，具有敏锐的商业头脑。

sentences.en: Her witty remarks added a little salt to the conversation.
sentences.cn: 她的妙语使谈话增添了一些风趣.

sentences.en: His plays were very good, very witty.
sentences.cn: 他的那些剧作非常好，非常诙谐。

sentences.en: It was a witty and diverting programme.
sentences.cn: 这是个妙趣横生的娱乐节目。

sentences.en: The book is witty and peppered with good one-liners.
sentences.cn: 这本书诙谐幽默，妙语趣话随处可见。

sentences.en: The dinner was often a riotous affair enlivened by superbly witty speeches.
sentences.cn: 宴会常常会因为一些非常诙谐的讲话而气氛活跃，热闹非凡。

sentences.en: The speech was full of ad - libs and witty asides.
sentences.cn: 讲演中满是即兴之词和诙谐离题之语.

sentences.en: The star clown was considered a master of witty banter.
sentences.cn: 那丑星被认为是个逗乐子的好手.

sentences.en: They were very intellectual and witty.
sentences.cn: 他们才思敏捷，风趣诙谐。

phrases.tran_cn: 诗词使人灵秀（出自培根散文《论读书》）

trans.tran_en: using words in a clever and amusing way
